ScriptActions.Description: Puts the TaskForce into Area Guard mode for the given units of time. Unlike the original timed Guard script action (5,n) that just stays in place doing a basic guard operation this action has a more active role attacking nearby invaders or defending units that needs protection.
If the TaskForce contains unit(s) that use ammo then the the script will not continue until all these units have fully refilled the ammo.
